text: V. Chandrakumar ( â€“ 7 April 2020), better known as Sasi Kalinga, was an Indian actor. He worked in Malayalam cinema. His acting credits include Paleri Manikyam: Oru Pathirakolapathakathinte Katha (2009), Pranchiyettan & the Saint (2010), Indian Rupee (2011), Adaminte Makan Abu (2011) and in Amen (2013). Kalinga died from liver disease in Kozhikode on 7 April 2020. He was reportedly 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors
title: Sasi Kalinga
